titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the employer wage credit for employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/28/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2014 the tax credit for differential wage payments to employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.
